page.title: 12SOCIAL ACTIVITIES (cont)
page.content: They first wore their new burgandy blazers in the Carey Baptist concert. The blazers have black lables edged with gold braid. The blazers cost 1.500 pounds altogether and many donations were sent in. The horse riding costs 5.00 pounds an hour (one lesson) and is very popular. The Moulton Art Group meets monthly in the Manfield Hall on Wednesday evenings. The meetings are open to visitors but it will cost 40p. There are sometimes coach outings to the Royal Academy,London etc. There is also a Moulton Village Trust. The A.G.M. was held on January 28th at Chapel House. Mr .F.Davies (chairman) and Mrs .B. Thompson (secretary) were re-elected and Mrs .W. Ridgeday was elected treasurer. A donation of 500.00 pounds was given to the Parish Council for equipment for the Public Gardens.
